    • Field Detail

      • component

        protected int component
        Records the component.

        Only positive values are allowed.

      • parent

        protected JPEG2KTile parent
        Is a pointer to the parent.

        It is useful to scan the tree structure from leaves to the root.

      • resolutionLevels

        protected java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,JPEG2KResolutionLevel> resolutionLevels

      • location

        private CADIPoint location
        Offset from the origin of the reference grid to the upper-left sample of the image area.

        It is computed by the getLocation() method.ÃŸ

      • removeResolutionLevel

        public void removeResolutionLevel(int rLevel)
        Removes a resolution level from the tile-component.

        It also removes all precincts defined in the resolution level.

        Parameters:
        rLevel - definition in JPEG2KResolutionLevel.rLevel.

      • availableFrameSizes

        public int[][] availableFrameSizes()
        Calculates the frame sizes for each resolution level according to the image parameters that are passed to the function. Further information, see ISO/IEC 15444-9 sect. C4
        Returns:
        an one-dimensional array with the frame sizes for each resolution level. The first index stands for the resolution level and the second one will be, 0 is for the width and 1 for the height.
